snippet: The American International Group has sold its $500 million stake in the Blackstone Group, severing a longtime direct investment in the private equity giant.
abstract: The American International Group has sold its $500 million stake in the Blackstone Group, severing a longtime direct investment in the private equity giant.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.print_headline: Finance: A.I.G. Sells the Last of Its Stake In Blackstone
